Submodules¶

pyproct.algorithms.spectral.parametersGeneration module¶

Created on 27/05/2013

@author: victor

class pyproct.algorithms.spectral.parametersGeneration.ParametersGenerator(parameters, matrix_handler)[source]¶

Bases: object

SPECTRAL_DEFAULT_MAX = 25¶
classmethod get_base_parameters()[source]¶

Defines the base parameters needed for each of the algorithms. Each parameter created will be based on one of those and must not have more keys than these.

@return: A dictionary with the base parameters for this algorithm.

get_parameters()[source]¶

This function creates some parameters to be used with the spectral clustering algorithm. @return: A tuple with the generated parameters and an empty list corresponding to the clusterings.

pyproct.algorithms.spectral.spectralClusteringAlgorithm module¶

Created on 14/08/2012

@author: victor

class pyproct.algorithms.spectral.spectralClusteringAlgorithm.SpectralClusteringAlgorithm(condensed_matrix, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

Implementation of Normalized Spectral clustering with Lrw Laplacian (Shi and Malik 2000). It tries to be both fast and memory efficient in order to be able to work with very big datasets.

handle_params(params, max_clusters_default)[source]¶
perform_clustering(kwargs)[source]¶

Does the actual clustering by doing a k-medoids clustering of the first k eigenvector rows.

@param kwargs: Dictionary with this mandatory keys:
  • ‘k’: Number of clusters to generate. Must be <= than max_clusters

@return: a Clustering instance with the clustered data.

spectral_types_enum = ['UNNORMALIZED', 'NORMALIZED']¶
